backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing script repository backend with access control, user profiles, and CRUD operations for scripts; includes public read endpoints and authenticated write/delete operations with admin privileges for viewing all deleted scripts.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three high-confidence features: homepage script listing, My Scripts page with edit/delete, and script detail page with syntax highlighting, mapped to test IDs REQ-1, REQ-2, and REQ-3.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and configuration files for the Rawly41 Store script repository application with PWA support and authentication.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for a developer-focused dark theme with grayscale base colors and accent colors for charts and UI elements.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for Rawly41 Store with PWA meta tags including manifest link, Apple touch icon, and mobile web app configuration for home screen installation.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, standalone display mode, turquoise theme color (#40E0D0), and icon configurations for 192x192 and 512x512 sizes.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for home, script detail, and my-scripts pages, wrapped with ThemeProvider, ProfileSetupModal, OnboardingModal, and Toaster components.
frontend/src/components/AuthGuard.tsx: Empty file placeholder for route protection component (no implementation present).
frontend/src/components/CodeBlock.tsx: Code display component with syntax highlighting styling and copy-to-clipboard functionality using navigator.clipboard API with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Application layout with header containing Rawly41 logo, navigation links (My Scripts, Submit Script for authenticated users), LoginButton, main content area, and footer with caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button component handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading states, error handling for duplicate authentication, and query cache clearing on logout.
First-time visitor modal displaying "Do This First" message encouraging users to add the app to their home screen, dismissible via localStorage tracking through useOnboardingModal hook.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that prompts authenticated users without a profile to enter their name. Prevents dismissal until profile is created.
frontend/src/components/ScriptCard.tsx: Card component displaying script metadata (title, description, category, author, creation date) with hover effects and link to script detail page.
frontend/src/components/ScriptGrid.tsx: Grid layout component that renders a collection of ScriptCard components with loading skeletons and empty state messaging.
frontend/src/components/ScriptSearch.tsx: Search and filter UI with debounced text input for title search, category dropdown selector, and clear button.
frontend/src/components/ScriptSubmission: Form component for creating new scripts with fields for title, description, category selection, and code content with validation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, initializes access control, and invalidates dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnboardingModal.ts: Hook that manages onboarding modal visibility state using localStorage to track if user has seen the modal.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profiles and scripts, including queries for fetching/searching scripts and mutations for creating/updating/deleting scripts.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI components using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main landing page displaying a hero banner, script search/filter functionality, and a grid of scripts with conditional rendering based on authentication status.
frontend/src/pages/MyScriptsPage.tsx: Authenticated user page for managing personal scripts with edit and delete functionality, including dialogs for editing script details and confirming deletions.
frontend/src/pages/ScriptDetailPage.tsx: Individual script detail view showing full script content with syntax highlighting, metadata, and delete option for script authors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting and persisting URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom colors using OKLCH, typography, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking known issues (missing scripts), existing features for script CRUD operations, and pending feature requests to restore script functionality.
